tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am so obliged writing this review about Dr. Nithin Vadlamudi. My father 72 Years undergone hip surgery on 15-Sep-20. *** ****** ** *** ****** ******* ** ************ *** **** **** ** **** ******* He was so genuine, responsible, caring, concerned about us that cannot be described through words. More than all as per my personal experience I have never seen a surgeon being so helpful, supportive, healer & kind. In my view the other name for humanity is Dr. Nithin Vadlamudi. He possesses great skill of surgery. My father is now started walking with the help of walker & I'm sure he will start walking normally in coming days. Dr. Nithin is a professional who just don't do his job as just another job he does it with 100% & long lasting cure. He respects his profession & more importantly he follows it ethically. This behaviour of Dr. Nithin remains same to every patient he meets, which is unbelievable. He even helped us reducing hospital charges, implant expenses & above all this he even waived off his charges with the hospital & asked them not to charge us (imagine who will do this in today's world).Dr. Nithin is my super hero, inspiration, idol & next to God.My father's wound also got completely healed in just 7 days from surgery. The time he came out of the OT & said operation went very well. I had a smile with tears. It's all because of you sir. Dr. Nithin & his clinic receptionist was constantly following up since my first appointment in their clinic in fact even today i receive whatsapp message asking about my dad's condition. What else for a patient want.* **** *** ****** *** *** **** *** ******* **** ***** ******* ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Nithin Vadlamudi is a good person as well as one of the best doctors in Bangalore city.He is very knowledgeable & on top of that, he listens very patiently.  I went with my father for checkup knee pain and he has listened to my father‚Äôs problem and answered all our questions. He made me understand the root cause of the pain. He did the operation in Apollo hospital and 3rd days onward my father able to walk and he was helped us too much. So, he is the best orthopaedic surgeon and an excellent doctor I met till date I can vouch him for any Orthopaedic issues.

I would highly recommend VNC Orthopaedic Clinic and he doesn't charge too much. I must say that it's so hard to find an honest doctor like Dr Nithin üôåüèª.

Specially thanks Mahendra (Physiotherapist) was also very friendly, patience and polite doctor and the way he handled each session of physiotherapy helped my mom to recover very well after the surgery. Overall it was a very good experience with the entire team.

Regards,
M Prasad Babu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Nithin at VNC ensured that my father started walking again properly within 6 weeks of Total Knee Replacement done on both the knees. My father was almost standstill for last few years and even taking 5 steps was a hard thing for him. Luckly I found VNC Clinic online and spoke to Dr Nithin initially. What amazed me is his humbleness to listen. I remember it was an one hour consultation call during lockdown wherein Dr Nithin saw all reports of my father over whatsapp and explained me his views and how should we go about it.

Around 45 days later, Dr Nithin operated my father and ensured a smooth hospital discharge after 5 days. His engagement level with my father and with me had been out of the world. He is always approachable, listens to your problems and provides a well round consultation and follow up conversations. Post discharge, Dr Nithin kept a constant watch on my father's improvement and progress. He makes best use of the technology to stay engaged with the patient and caretakers. This gave lot of flexibility to me to ensure that my father does not have to venture out unnecessarily during Covid times.

Besides being a skillful surgeon, Dr Nithin is a very humble human being and comes out as a well rounded personality with full of empathy - this is a hall mark of his character and the efficacy of his clinic. VNC premise is nice and clean. Receptionist is very helpful and ensures you and your patient is well taken care during entire patient engagement lifecycle.

I would never forget his gesture when he drove down to see off my father on the road after being discharged.

Dr Nithin also diagnosed my mother's back problem and referred the case to more suitable spine surgeon. My mother got operated a month later by different surgeon but Dr Nithin ensured that he is present during surgery and have daily engagement level with my mother during her hospitalization.

Thank you VNC and Dr Nithin for your exemplary patient service. I wish you a great journey ahead in serving the patients and people in need.

With Gratitude !
Vineet Sood

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Doctor Nithin 2-3 times since 2019, for lower back aches and for wrist pain. He doesn't prescribe medication, scans, or treatments unnecessarily. The doctor is polite and patient with his communication, which makes the clients feel comfortable to explain the condition they are experiencing. The doctor always uses the anatomy visuals to explain the condition in detail so the client understands what is going on. I highly recommend the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
First time i met this Doctor had an amzing experience, the way he listen to my problem  patiently which i never come across with any doctor in the past. After listening to my entire problems, he had gone through all my past reports and advised me for further treatment.

I approached for the same issue with other Dr, who had suggested me for surgery without listening my problem and proper diagnosing. But Dr Nithin who is really a great person with lot of empathy he treats the patient and never suggest  initially for the surgery and also prescribe simple medicine.

In general, the so called  Doctors will forgot us after consultation but Dr NIthin who do follow up with patient and asking for our progress which i never come across with any Dr especially in Bangalore.

I recommend Dr Nithin, who really a great personality  with his good attitude, sympathy towards the patient and his knoweldge on  profession awasome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: You can freely speak to him, quite friendly in listening. He will explain things clearly. Even to our silly doubts. Gives very less medication and also only if needed. He told me the side effects as well, that I will feel dizzy for first two days of medication. You should visit him for any muscle, ortho issues. If you treated or treating with some other doctor and not completely satisfied, you can definitely visit him once to get a second opinion. I made three visits due to on and off strains. He said my upper back will recover slowly and suggests stretch exercises. I felt completely satisfied with each vist. Thanks Dr. Nithin.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I initially went with the pain on my knee, and it was promptly diagnosed as the ligament tear by the surgeon. Procedure was done immediately and post rehab care was also done proactively. Post that reviews are done at regular interval and free of cost. 

The doctor is very knowledgeable, and the diagnosis are done correctly without unwanted medical scans or procedures. 

I definitely recommend for any ortho related complaints.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently took my mother to see Dr. Nitin for a fracture she sustained in a fall. 

I was extremely impressed with Dr. Nitin professionalism and expertise. Not only did he provide excellent medical care, but he also took the time to explain the treatment plan and answer all of our questions.

 My mother felt at ease with his kind demeanor and compassionate approach. Thanks to Dr. Nitin , my mother is on the road to recovery. I would highly recommend him to anyone in need of orthopedic care.

Doctor was so friendly and I was late by 5-10 min as per scheduled appointment but he took time and investigated thoroughly and explained the issue as he understood. Didn't depend upon much medication but the excersize and postures and lifestyle. Prescribed what was really needed. I loved his approach to the issue and behaviour.

We consulted Dr Nithin regarding a fracture in my dad s finger. He heard the problem patiently, and explained us the X-ray findings, treatment , and, exercises in detail. Doctor is very humble and patient, he answered all our questions . The clinic was also well organised and we didn‚Äôt have any waiting time. Would definitely consult him again. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Nitin for the injury I had by falling from bike. He was very patient and was very attentive. Explained in detail what could have gone wrong. Made it very clear about every step that we took in our treatment. I felt no stress thanks to his calm demeanor in handling patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: AMAZING doctor and I being a healthcare professional truly admire his attitude towards patients . He makes sure he listens to ur concerns and give u appropriate advise. Above all his first followup is not chargeable , but he still give same amount of attention n care to the patient which is a rare phenomena in Bangalore's private hospitals

Dr. Nithin is very professional, he listen and understand  to our problems and explains the root cause for the problem and solution. Very mild medication and no unnecessary scan or X-rays unless it's severe. Staffs over there are also Kind and helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had visited him regarding knee problems post Anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction. He takes out the time to understand, diagnose and explain the issue properly using very detailed models of the knee. Great learning experience talking to him as well!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Nithin for knee pain treatment. He prescribed the right exercises for recovery. He is very friendly and has the patience to explain the issue in detail to the patient. Also the clinic has imaging services which prevents the hassle of visiting a diagnostic centre.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor Nithin is one among the very few doctors out there who prescribes u very less or even NO medicines and try to cure u with ur diet ,lifestyle and some doable exercises...always give him the first priority if u have any orthopedic issues. He gives u hope and confidence which is what a worried patient requires

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would highly recommend visiting Nithin if you are facing foot related issues. He clearly explained the cause for my foot pain and suggested what needs to be done.
Additionally good response from the receptionist. Overall they are professional and I had a good experience .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor was extremely friendly. Takes time to explain the problem in detail. Prefer natural recovery over medications (unless really needed). His ability to explain the issue to a layman was exemplary. Would recommend to everyone with an ortho issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had consulted Dr.Nithin for an ankle ligament issue after consulting n number of doctors who could neither give me a definite diagnosis nor provide any remedies. Dr.Nithin's approach to the patient is heartwarming, he is an amazing clinician and examined thoroughly and diagnosed the problem. The treatment he gave helped me recover. Also the clinic is operated in a very professional manner. Thank you so much doctor. I really recommend Dr.Nithin for any kind of ortho related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well learned dr who not only diagnosis the problem but explains in detail and helped us avoid an expensive surgery for broken bones. He is well mannered, humble and makes a sincere to diagnose the issue, treat the patient fairly and give hope when a patient is worried. Definitely recommend him for all ortho related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Nithin after I met with an accident and injured my lisfranc (mid foot) area (bone and ligament). After an X-ray, he meticulously explained to me what has actually happened to my bone and what is the short term and long term solution to my pain. He was extremely careful and sincere during the consultation, x-ray and plaster. Excellent experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor listened carefully to my problem and explained me about the back spine in which i might be experiencing the pain. He did not rush to give some medicines instead told me how to correct posture while working and sleeping. Felt really good and relieved after talking to doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Nithin as my mother had shoulder pain, he explained the issue extremely well and asked to get a MRI to get clarity on the issue and suggested treatment accordingly. Highly recommend him for any orthopedic consultations, very polite and knowledgeable doctor who will make you comfortable and suggest effective treatment for the issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Well i was horrified by my lower back pain and was afraid that i won't be able to rely on myself. The doctor listened and tried to ascertain and later diagnosed and explained in detail. He was calm and friendly in assuaging any fears and recommended many exercises. The pain hasn't disappeared but it's manageable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr for neck stiffness and neck pain. Dr patiently listened to my symptoms and took time to explain the cause and remedy. He uses anatomical images on his latop to explain.Dr is very knowledgeable and has excellent intra personal skills and knows how to manage a patient.Ive already recommended the Dr to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I went to see the doctor on my lower back problem. The doctor was very welcoming and friendly and he heard my issue and identified the problem within a few minutes. He even explained clearly on what the issue is and showed visually on a tablet what the issue is which was very helpful in visualizing. Overall the experience was very nice and I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: First of all we did not have to wait at all. I visited for pain in my pinky finger of right foot. Doctor was pretty prompt with all his actions. He explained very verv clearly on what causes such issues. Mine turned out to be a nerve issue. He prescribes bare minimum medicines and suggested lifestyle changes.Liked the subtle behaviour of him and the grip on his knowledge. Hope my pain relieves soon. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: pick any parameter and the doctor is absolutely brilliant.explanation of the issuetreatment planrisk and side effectscost of treatmentI highly recommend him to everyone who needs an orthopedic treatment. For his returning patients he sometimes doesnt even charges the consultation fees.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My cousin came with lower back pain , spondylitis MRI, CT and with many doubts to bangalore to see good orthopedist. i knew nithin sir from last one year for my aunty back pain issue and my CTS issue , we got good direction and medicines from sir. so, Nitin sir spent sufficient time with us in his clinic, explained the issue very well and give tablets and good suggestions, posture correction, exercises and  life style change need. Nithin sir is better than any HOD /Spine surgeon of Big hospital. ** ***** ********* *********** ***** ** ********* * he studies re case completely and gives what they need.  excellent doctor by values . With ny experience I'm telling any bones problems ...must visit doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother is a RA patient and at about 7:00 pm I call VNC clinic for appointment with doctor Nithin even though it was late and he didn‚Äôt have patients he waited for us. He spoke at length to understand my mom‚Äôs health concerns, diagnosed her condition gave her minimal medicine for relief. We followed up after three days and he referred us to a specialist. I am not surprised why this doctor has 100% rating, he deserves more than that. A thorough gentleman and a very professional doctor. In a very very long time I came across such a good doctor and human being. God bless Doctor Nithin and his family

He reassured me  that  the problem can be solved with proper precautions. I am happy with consultation and highly recommend him.
